titles: Encouragements to faith Drawn from severall engagements both of Gods Christs heart to receive pardon sinners. By Tho: Goodwin, B.D.
author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
notes: The words "Gods Christs" and "receive pardon" are enclosed in brackets on title page.
Also bound with some copies of Wing G1229.
Appears also at reel 1886 as part of Wing G1229.
Reproduction of original in: New College (University of Edinburgh). Library.
keywords: Forgiveness of sin --  Early works to 1800.
